00013 void AABBLinkedList::Clear()
00014 {
00015         AABBNode *ptr = m_first;
00016 
00017         while (ptr->GetNext() != NULL)
00018         
00019         // clear memory
00020         Delete(ptr);
00021 }
00022 
00023 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 
00025 void AABBLinkedList::Delete(AABBNode *before)
00026 {
00027         AABBNode *temp = before->GetNext();
00028 
00029         before->SetNext(temp->GetNext());
00030 
00031         delete temp;
00032 }

00034 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00036 bool AABBLinkedList::AddToStart (GLdouble maxX, GLdouble minX, GLdouble maxY,
00037                                              GLdouble minY, GLdouble maxZ, GLdouble minZ)
00038 {
00039         AABBNode *newNode;
00040         try
00041         {
00042                 newNode = new AABBNode;
00043         }
00044         catch(...)
00045         {
00046                 return false;
00047         }
00048         
00049         // add the value to the node
00050         newNode->SetData(maxX, minX, maxY, minY, maxZ, minZ);
00051         // set the address of the net node
00052         newNode->SetNext(m_first->GetNext());
00053         // reset the address of the first node
00054         m_first->SetNext(newNode);
00055 
00056         return true;
00057 }
00058

00060 
00061 GLdouble AABBLinkedList::GetMaxX (int ptrCount)
00062 {
00063         AABBNode *ptr = (m_first);
00064         for (int count = 0; count < ptrCount; count++)
00065         {
00066                 ptr = ptr->GetNext();
00067         }
00068 
00069         if (ptr->GetNext() != NULL)
00070                 return ptr->GetNext()->GetMaxX();       
00071         else 
00072                 return NULL;
00073 }

00155 
00156 void AABBLinkedList::SetData (const int &ptrCount,
00157                                                           const GLdouble maxX, const GLdouble minX,
00158                                               const GLdouble maxY, const GLdouble minY,
00159                                               const GLdouble maxZ, const GLdouble minZ)
00160 {
00161         AABBNode *ptr = (m_first);
00162 
00163         for (int count = 0; count < ptrCount; count++)
00164         {
00165                 ptr = ptr->GetNext();
00166         }
00167         ptr->GetNext()->SetData(maxX, minX, maxY, minY, maxZ, minZ);    
00168 }

00170 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 
00172 int AABBLinkedList::GetListSize()
00173 {
00174         int tmpSize = 0;
00175         // count size of list
00176         for (AABBNode *ptr = (m_first); ptr->GetNext() != NULL; ptr = ptr->GetNext())
00177         {
00178                 tmpSize++;
00179         }
00180         return tmpSize;
00181 }
